main event: An unidentified object was observed in Madisonville, Kentucky, on February 23, 1959, moving as a bright white light parallel to the horizon before disappearing over the horizon to the west.
interesting points: The sighting was made using ground-radar observation., The object was observed for a duration of 3 minutes., The object's course was westward., The observer described the object as a bright white light., The observer was a civilian maintenance electrician.
